actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make certain highway improvements in order to more effectively carry out the purposes of the Navajo Indian Irrigation Project, New Mexico.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make improvements in specified highways in order to more effectively carry out the purposes of the Navajo Indian irrigation project, New Mexico. Authorizes to be appropriated to the Highway Trust Fund up to $5,000,000 for each fiscal year for fiscal years 1975 through 1979.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make certain highway improvements in order to more effectively carry out the purposes of the Navajo Indian Irrigation Project, New Mexico.
